Modern Gents: I apologize for the inconvenience this has caused. This offer requires two eligible items in your cart, and add-on items do not qualify. You'll also need to enter code MY70 in the promo box at checkout to apply the discount.

To better assist you, could you let me know which items are currently in your cart? If it's easier, you're welcome to share a screenshot, and I'll take a closer look to make sure everything qualifies correctly. 

If you're thinking about adding another item to meet the requirements, you can check out our new arrivals here: https://modgents.attn.tv/amCPatN8capB

Modern Gents: Thanks for sending that screenshot over! It appears that you only have one item in your cart, that's likely why the offer is not showing. Please note that it requires two eligible items in your cart and you need to enter the code: MY70 as well during checkout.

Please let me know how I can assist you further today, I'm just a text away!

send_to_cs: Send to CS immediately if cx did not receive their order
Send to CS immediately for post purchase inquiries about the status of the mold, or issues with the molds
Send to CS for pricing inquiries
Send to CS if cx is looking for a more specific piece not available on the website
Send to CS if cx is asking for a code and we don't have one
escalate: No escalations for this client, send everything to CS
tone: Use Teeth instead of Pieces (e.g 8 teeth at the top)
templates: If the image is not coming through a second time, send Broken Image temp
For CUSTOM GRILLZ & ACCESSORIES INQUIRIES for models not available on the website use PS shortcut
For urgent concerns/delayed escalation response use PS shortcut
For delayed orders and the customer is frustrated use PS shortcut
For customer service use shortcut CS which has both the direct email/number
dos_and_donts: Do not use the order history as a reference to order status
If customers want to cancel their order always ask for the reason for cancellation
drive_to_purchase: Don't recommend pre-made grillz! Upsell to fitted and custom grillz
When recommending an item, let the cx know they can customize their order on the product page
When recommending an item, ask the cx if they are working with a budget
Use LFG shortcut to gather information and provide recommendations when cx ask about:

send_to_cs: Send to CS if a subscriber mentions a medical issue or an adverse effect from using products from this brand
dos_and_donts: Do not share any medical advice or guidance to subscribers outside of recommending appropriate products or directing them to purchase the right item
Do not comment on their medical situations
Close the covo if the customer says they're receiving too many messages/we're texting them too often - don't send TMT
drive_to_purchase: If cx says they will be ordering soon, offer to schedule a call if they need further assistance with their purchase (shortcut OS) - do not upsell
tone: Don't use the term "hang tight", just say that you've passed the information to the team
Close the conversation once the client takes over
templates: If cx already purchased, use specific TFP template
promo_and_exclusions: We do not offer any discounts for the SPECTRUM
